commentary: There goes Chekhov's Faygo, sailing over the sea in search of Eridan's feet. Let's remember to remember this happened, when we see it again. Also, I'm going to speculate that just sort of reaching over...and...taking an object out of a card is probably something you can do with any shitty modus when you feel like you've exhausted all other options. It's just that no one ever actually thinks to try it. They're never stoned enough.
